comment: It was an easy class, but there were essays you had to do. There are also books you have to read. It was easy but very time consuming. She is nice though and encourages you to go to the writing center I think she gave us extra credit fo going. Take her but put in time!!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Accessible outside class

comment: One of the easiest teachers to take for world lit, do her quizzes and that is basically your test so easy A. You do like 3 papers, but she is an easy grader. Just pay attention and you'll easily pass.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: Sweetest teacher ever, she can be a bit boring but she has such a sweet soul!!! She's an easy grader, isn't too harsh. Class is mandatory, but she understands if you aren't able to show up! Overall great teacher (:
Super easy A as long as you read. No papers and a really sweet lady. She wants you to pass and does not make ir hard to do so. A little unorganized but it didnt make a difference to me.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: Sweetest woman ever; love her to death. Very easy professor if you just do the (very short) readings and pay some attention in class. You can tell she wants to make her class easy and enjoyable and gives as little work as possible. Quizzes sometimes have one or two tricky questions but the tests are extremely easy. Can't recommend her enough.

She's a queen, this was her first hybrid so it was pretty easy, do the papers and other little things and you'll pass. Go to the writing center for help if you need! She's so nice and funny and if you need help and you actually tried she'll help you
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Hilarious

comment: She's quirky! Definitely take her! She made class enjoyable and I was able to pay attention every class. No electronics allowed during class, she takes attendance, docks points for being late which is understandable. She gave my class 1 reading a week which was definitely do-able. Tests were the quiz questions rearranged. ACTUALLY READ ASSIGNMENTS

TAKE HER. She's pretty amazing, and she's very understanding of everything. If you don't like writing essays every week, this class is for you. She wants you to succeed and is based on quizzes and exams. If you read you're sure to get an A, and the reading isn't too bad. All the things you'll read are interesting in their own way. Overall Dope.

Take her!!! She is an amazing professor. If you don't like writing papers every week then this is for you . You have to read the stories that she gives out because she may do pop quizzes. The answers from the quiz will the on the exams, so make sure you go class. Only 3 exams and you're done. She drops the lowest quiz grade. Prof. Wurl is lit!!!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--Caring

comment: Professor Wurl is an awesome instructor despite criticism from students wanting someone to "give" them an A (typical of our generation). Her tests are straight from the quizzes. Attendance is of utmost importance! I had a tough semester and missed a few days (including the last day-final was online) but totally my fault if I get a big hit there.

Professor wurl is all over the place and she almost cares too much. Students took advantage of her throughout the semester, she cracked down, and the students didn't take well with her employing her authority. Aside from that she is very nice and the tests came straight from her quizzes. She truly wants her students to do well. Definitely take.
Professor Wurl is so nice. Quizzes on readings, lowest quiz grade is dropped, tests are the literally the quizzes verbatim and one short essay near the end of the semester. Easy class.

just no. okay just no. She is the most scatter brained teacher ever. all she talks about is her ex-husbands and her cats. The class is a waste of time but attendance is mandatory. The entire course could be done online. She takes months to grade things. DO NOT TAKE HER. I have never made below a 95 in an english class and I will be lucky to get a B
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Shes very boring, her lectures went from history to philosophy some days. They were never on topic and it felt like as a teacher she should know all of her information, but she doesnt. Seems like lectures are random. Made me hate lit and Im a English minor.

Awesome teacher! Easy A, but she does talk a lot and is a little scatter brained. Some classes you just show up to hear her talk about literally nothing, but I guess it comes with the territory of getting an easy A ;)

Ms. Wurl was a great professor! Very easy to talk to and she made it clear what she expected from you. There were 4 papers and a few quizzes, nothing too major. She took a little while to grade but overall a very nice lady!

Prof. Wurl is a sweet lady, but she is very scatterbrained. She will begin one topic and then veer off into another without finishing her first thought. Her grading criteria is clear. Make sure you meet her word count, EVERY TIME. Make sure you cite correctly and always have a work cited page, and you should be fine. Do not take her early in the morning, especially not if it's a MWF class. You will hate it so much. I would take it in the afternoon, if you can. Fairly easy class though.
Professor Wurl was an amazing teacher! Show up and participate equals easy A!
she talks a lot and gets off topic pretty easily but overall a pretty easy class
Like a mom. Talks a lot. Easy class.

SUPER EASY. The class is pretty boring and it's a lot of busy work but as long as you come to class and turn in the assignments you can make an A. Theres a lot of in class assignments and she starts dropping your grade after 3 absences. Would definitely recommend taking her!

She is super easy. She lets you pick your topic for every paper and lets you choose MLA or APA format for each paper. She is not good at explaining things and gets off topic so easily. She never finishes her thoughts or sentences so explanations are very confusing. She takes attendance and after 4 absences she drops your final grade.

Ms. Wurl was a great teacher. Not a difficult class at all. There was some writing each week, and the class was themed towards crime and punishment kinda. All lead up to a big research paper, which she didn't grade very hard. Very nice!

She is awesome! I loved her. Her classes were pretty easy. I felt like I was in a high school class most of the time. She does have a lot of busy work, but if you like that, which I do, then you'll love her classes. In English 1101 our final was playing english jeopardy. In 1102, we watch Capote and had to write a paper on it.

She is real nice hippy lady but real spacey with her lectures and teaching methods. A lot of busy work in the class and a real tough grader on papers. I got a C on the final research paper we had but still managed a B in the class!

very very nice. i hate english but didnt mind coming to her class. one big paper at the end but doesnt grade it too hard. wrote short 1-2 page papers in class each week. im a horrible writer but still made Bs on pretty much everything. C on the big paper  so i made a C in the class. you can miss like 5 days and then she drops your grade. very nice.
Great teacher, would recommend to anyone having to take this required class.
Ms. Wurl is a very sweet teacher that cares about her students. The class was very easy and the work is not difficult at all. You should definitely take her.

mrs wurl is the easiest teacher ever!!! i love her! i hate english and was worried about writing papers but we NEVER have to write. we do little paragraphs here and there and thats about it. i would def recommed her if you dont care much for writing!
Great teacher.... very helpful!!

she is great with helping with papers and all but when it comes to actually teaching she's kinda not so great!!! i mean an english teacher that spells things wrong on the board...there is something wrong there! she is kinda spacy too!!!
